abstract: One week after NBC’s “Bionic Woman” outperformed ABC’s “Private Practice” in the 9 p.m. time slot on Wednesday, the match-up looked different in their second go-around. According to Nielsen’s estimates, the NBC remake plummeted 30 percent from its debut among adults aged 18 to 49, while the ABC spinoff declined 13 percent to finish first for the night overall in that demographic.
lead_paragraph: One week after NBC’s “Bionic Woman” outperformed ABC’s “Private Practice” in the 9 p.m. time slot on Wednesday, the match-up looked different in their second go-around. According to Nielsen’s estimates, the NBC remake plummeted 30 percent from its debut among adults aged 18 to 49, while the ABC spinoff declined 13 percent to finish first for the night overall in that demographic.
